mutants.original_line: cur = {i | j for j in cur} | {i}
mutants.mutated_line: cur = {i | j for j in cur} & {i}

mutants.mutated_line: cur = {i | j for j in cur} ^ {i}

mutants.mutated_line: cur = {i & j for j in cur} | {i}
